Package oshi.hardware.platform.unix.freebsd

Class FreeBsdDisks

java.lang.Object
oshi.hardware.platform.unix.freebsd.FreeBsdDisks
@ThreadSafe
public final class FreeBsdDisks
extends java.lang.Object
FreeBSD hard disk implementation.

    • updateDiskStats

      public static boolean updateDiskStats​(HWDiskStore diskStore)
      Updates the statistics on a disk store.
      Parameters:
      diskStore - the HWDiskStore to update.
      Returns:
      true if the update was (probably) successful.

    • getDisks

      public static HWDiskStore[] getDisks()
      Gets the disks on this machine
